name: StoriiCare
0:
”Alexa, ask story care what activities do we have today”
”Alexa, ask story care where is the next activity”
”Alexa, ask story care what is my name”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: story care
Developer Terms of Use
des: With StoriiCare's Alexa skill, you can now ask Alexa to tell you about your care community's activities. What's happening today, or what's next on the agenda? Speak with Alexa to find out!
